import React from 'react'; import { Card, Modal, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import About from './about.js' import Contact from './contact.js' import ScrollableAnchor from 'react-scrollable-anchor' export default class Projects extends React.Component{ state = { open: false } show = (size1) => () => this.setState({ size1, openTranslateMe: true }) close = () => this.setState({ openTranslateMe: false }) show = (size2) => () => this.setState({ size2, openRickandMorty: true }) close = () => this.setState({ openRickandMorty: false }) show = (size3) => () => this.setState({ size3, openTonester: true }) close = () => this.setState({ openTonester: false }) render(){ const { openTranslateMe, size1 } = this.state const { openRickandMorty, size2 } = this.state const { openTonester, size3 } = this.state return(
